solution_line_template: Quinn will read {books_per_week} books per week for {total_weeks} weeks so {books_per_week}*{total_weeks}=<<{books_per_week}*{total_weeks}={total_books_read}>>{total_books_read} books
If he reads {books_per_donut} books, he gets a free donut. So if he reads {total_books_read}/{books_per_donut} = <<{total_books_read}/{books_per_donut}={free_donuts}>>{free_donuts} free donuts
